homepage.mainDescription: Computer Science student at the University of Bologna, ex-Erasmus at Brno University of Technology, developer, {years} years old, living in Modena

descriptions.0: I started programming when I was 9 years old and since then I have never stopped exploring computer science in all its branches.
descriptions.1: Studying mainly as a self-taught student, I continued my studies in computer science and telecommunications at ITIS Fermi in Modena, graduating with 98/100.
descriptions.2: I am currently studying at Alma Mater, and I am aiming for a master's degree in AI (somewhere).
